mapper.select: SELECT contents FROM NARO_CONTENTS WHERE del_yn = 'N' AND open_yn = 'Y' AND date_format(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') BETWEEN open_start_datetime AND open_end_datetime AND gbn=#{gbn} ORDER BY idx DESC

SELECT contents FROM NARO_CONTENTS WHERE del_yn='N' AND open_yn = 'Y' AND date_format(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') BETWEEN open_start_datetime AND open_end_datetime AND gbn=#{gbn} ORDER BY idx DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.idx , a.title , a.thumbnail_file , b.name as category FROM naro_news a INNER JOIN (SELECT idx , name FROM naro_news_category WHERE parent_idx IN (SELECT idx FROM naro_news_category WHERE is_open ='Y' AND del_yn ='N' AND lvl = 1 ) AND del_yn ='N' AND is_open = 'Y' ) b ON a.category_idx = b.idx WHERE a.open_yn ='Y' AND a.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY a.write_date DESC LIMIT 8;

SELECT a.idx , a.title , a.subtitle , a.banner_file , b.name as category , DATE_FORMAT(a.write_date, '%Y. %m. %d') as write_date FROM naro_news a INNER JOIN ( SELECT idx , name FROM naro_news_category WHERE parent_idx = #{idx} AND del_yn ='N' AND is_open = 'Y' AND lvl = 2 ) b ON a.category_idx = b.idx WHERE a.open_yn ='Y' AND a.del_yn = 'N' AND a.banner_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY a.idx DESC LIMIT #{limit}
